Here are seven examples of activities that students can access to support transition planning within the Jefferson Morgan School District:

1. Students will have the opportunity to meet with an OVR representative and complete an application for services and training opportunities through OVR.

2. Student will complete a career portfolio through a program called Career Cruising – a self-exploration and planning program that helps people of all ages achieve their potential in career and life.

4. Students will have the opportunity to visit our local Career and Technology Center to investigate programs that may be of interest to him or her.  

5. Students will have the opportunity to take the ASVAB. 

6. Student will have the opportunity to talk to military recruiters.

7. Students will have an opportunity to attend a college fair.
